name: cleverti
description:
Cleverti is a Portuguese IT outsourcing company providing software development and testing services.
We offer fully tailored, cost-effective and scalable nearshore solutions to help you build and deliver high-quality, affordable, software applications with faster time-to-market.
Our technology solutions rely on talented IT professionals, a comprehensive technology stack, and flexible engagement models.
Since 2010, we have successfully developed and managed the software applications of many cross-sector companies from mature technology markets such as Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Luxemburg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the UK.
